task.title: Creating New enquiry in packager template

taskbody.prereq: You must have a T24 running environment and an active T24 server.
taskbody.context: This task gives you an example of enquiry creation in the context of packager template.

step.info:
You can set the following properties for the example:
Enquiry Name=ENQ.DEMO
Application=FUNDS.TRANSFER
Header=My Title
List of fields:
DEBIT.ACCT.NO
DEBIT.CURRENCY
DEBIT.AMOUNT
DEBIT.VALUE.DATE
CREDIT.AMOUNT
CREDIT.CURRENCY

step.cmd: Click inside the ENQ.DEMO.enquiry in the editor and hit keys Ctrl+G .
step.stepresult: Your enquiry is generated and deployed on your local T24 environment.

taskbody.result: You can now run your enquiry in browser: QUERY ENQ.DEMO .
